title: Print, "Design for Cartouche", 1745
medium: Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper
inscribed: On plate, upper center: 2me. Livre; upper right: B; central compartment: Morceaux/de Caprice A/divers usages./Inventé par François/de Cuvilliés Conseiller/et Architecte de/Sa Majesté/Imperialle. se/vend chez/Lauteur.; lower left: Inventé par F. de Cuvilliés; lower center: C.P.S.C.M./Se vend a Paris chez le Sr. Poilly ruë St. Iacque a limage St. Benoit Avec Privilege du Roy; lower right: gravé par Georg Sig. Roesch/1
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux (D. 80 and 81)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for Cartouche", 1745.
1745. Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-285-8.
